 2021-10022021-12-09,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActFederal Courts Act
SubjectRules Amending the Federal Courts Rules
PrecisRules amending the FEDERAL COURTS in order to (1) allow the Courts to strike a balance between the importance and the complexity of the case and the amounts involved; (2) provide the Courts with the necessary tools to deal directly with dysfunctional or destructive conduct in the litigation process; (3) increase the effectiveness of the Federal Court of Appeal in managing motions and access to justice for litigants; and (4) reform the definition of “Christmas recess” and “holiday.”
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0244 Publication Date: 2021-12-22
AttachmentsAttachment
